description.S: SABMiller plc is engaged in the beer and soft drinks business. The Company operates through six segments: Latin America, Africa, Asia Pacific, Europe, North America and Corporate. Its Latin America brewing and beverage operations cover approximately six countries across South and Central America (Colombia, Ecuador, El Salvador, Honduras, Panama and Peru). Its Africa brewing and beverage operations in Africa cover approximately 20 countries, including Botswana, Mozambique, Nigeria, South Africa, Tanzania, Uganda and Zambia. Its brewing interests across Asia Pacific cover approximately four countries: Australia, China, India and Vietnam. Its Europe brewing operations cover approximately nine countries, including the Czech Republic, Hungary, Italy, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, Spain (Canary Islands), the Netherlands and the United Kingdom. Its North America segment includes its interest in MillerCoors LLC, Miller Brewing International, Inc. and its North American holding companies.

financial_summary.S: BRIEF: For the fiscal year ended 31 March 2016, SABMiller plc revenues decreased 10% to $19.83B. Net income decreased 18% to $2.7B. Revenues reflect Latin America segment decrease of 10% to $7.02B, Africa segment decrease of 11% to $6.13B, Europe segment decrease of 11% to $3.72B. Net income also reflects Latin America segment income decrease of 11% to $1.87B, Africa segment income decrease of 13% to $1.31B, Europe segment income decrease of 7% to $511M.

name.S: Deputy Chairman and Senior Independent Director
Chairman and Managing Director of SAB Ltd.
General Counsel and Corporate Affairs Director
Managing Director, SABMiller Asia Pacific; Chief Executive Officer of Carlton & United Breweries
Independent Non-Executive Director and Chairman Designate
